**Is this a bug report or feature request?**
* Bug Report

**Deviation from expected behavior:**
Wrong Pod name and hostname is shown in the alert CephMonHighNumberOfLeaderChanges.
Eg:Ceph Monitor "rook-ceph-mgr": instance 10.131.0.16:9283 has seen 2.85 leader changes per minute recently.

**Expected behavior:**

The alert mentions "rook-ceph-mgr", which is not a ceph monitor. The message needs to be updated to provide proper alerts.
eg: Ceph Monitor mon.c on host ip-10-0-157-75.ec2.internal has seen 1.42 leader changes per minute recently.


**How to reproduce it (minimal and precise):**
<!-- Please let us know any circumstances for reproduction of your bug. -->
After restarting MON pods in the cluster, one after the other, the following alert messages can be seen.
